chunks.original_text: 接真之道既毕，乃又两足俱上玄冥星，以右手抚心，以左手指丹元星，闭气三息，叩齿三七通，胭掖三过，名曰步斗。 微祝曰： 洞天神光，迥亿玄冥，气盈太虚，去来无形，隐天藏地，周灌无生，忽登天钢，上步紫庭，北视雷房，南显电城，眩惑万变，非复故形，恍惚流景，触手立成，欲求藏身，得我姓名，虚元傲兀，九变玄冥，坐起六甲，谒署六丁，赐某隐书，步斗行星，仰见上皇，披丹巾青，手把灵光，腰带玉铃，上乞飞仙，与天俱生，名书太微，浮化上清，下乞变化，藏景录形，万事如愿，前由皆平，有恶我者，戮以神兵。 太极真经金根上文曰：子登玄冥，步斗#5隐形，子欲变化，当得我名，回天动地，万物立成。 步玄冥时，及欲隐时，当心存此名字。 步斗之道既毕#6，乃又两足俱上丹元星，以左手抚心，以右手指北极星，闭气三息，叩齿三通，咽液三过，名曰蹑纪。 微祝曰： 太上九台，丹元玄纪，外管北极，内正天理，金阙映外，玉庭耀裹，中有至尊，号曰赤子，治在丹元，绛房之中，翠云绣华，龙帔虎裳，右执皇箓，左把魁纲，足蹑景云，首巾紫冠，右佩流铃，左带玉珰。 赐某隐书，蹑纪游行，上乞飞仙，乘玄驾龙，书名丹台，太极玉堂，所向所求，福禄来迎，有恶某者，愿为灭亡，给侍神官，玉女玉童。 蹑纪之道既毕，乃又两足俱上北极星，以右手抚心，以左手指天关星，闭气三息，叩齿三通，咽液三过，名曰步纲。 微祝曰： 玄上太微，北极紫盖，下有太真，游翔九外，翠华飞裙，金铃青带，腰佩玉光，玄云奄蔼，赐某隐书，上行七气，登清戏烟，真人合会，乞丐飞仙，书名丹室，所向如愿，无灾无害，有恶我者，令彼伤败。 步纲之道既毕，乃又两足俱上天关星，以右手抚心，左手指天关，闭气三息，叩齿三通，咽液三过，名曰乘龙。 微祝曰： 太上七极，紫微绝辰，宝玄金房，外有玉门，周运九官，调和天关，中有尊神，号曰紫皇，授某隐书，携某乘龙，上游九天，下飞地元，景云丹舆，玄华翠裳，腰佩龙策，头巾虎文，包生万物，教训飞仙，脱某死名，天地长存，乘龙步斗，所向受恩，有恶我者，风刀火然。 乘龙之道既毕，乃又两足俱上辅星，闭气一息，叩齿三通，咽液一过，名曰游行三命，旋步天英也。 微祝曰： 太极辅星，精在紫关，养生育命，宝守神魂，金房再开，奉见辅君，赐某隐书，使某游旋，列名圣皇，飞仙九天，巾金佩真，出入洞门。 游行三命既毕，乃回行诣弼星，两足俱上，闭气一息，叩齿三通，咽液一过，名曰徘徊三阳，出入三生。 微祝曰： 太虚泥丸，紫宫天尊，玄空真纽，为帝之先，在道玉皇，在身泥丸，冯感欻生，气贯霄元，精入明堂，强胎益魂，朱山再开，奉近灵元，左采日华，右掇月根，流火万丈，金罗碧裙，腰带天骨，首戴华冠，赐某隐书，得行天关，乞愿飞仙，役使万神，万向皆会，福德如山。 行事时； 皆北向执隐书而为之也，亦可按文视星，不必暗诵而作也。
chunks.translated_text:
Having completed the Way of Connecting with the Perfected, one then steps with both feet onto the Star of Profound Darkness. With the right hand placed upon the heart and the left hand pointing to the Star of Cinnabar Prime, hold the breath for three cycles, knock the teeth three times seven, and swallow saliva thrice—this is called "Treading the Dipper."

A whispered invocation follows:
"Radiance of the Grotto-Heaven,
boundless in the Profound Darkness,
qi fills the Great Void,
coming and going without form.
Hidden in heaven, concealed in earth,
pervading and irrigating the unborn,
suddenly ascending the Brazen Sky,
stepping above the Purple Court.
Gazing north to the Thunder Chamber,
gazing south to the Lightning City,
dazzling and confounding the myriad transformations,
no longer in their former shape.
In the flickering flow of light,
touching the hand, they instantly form.
Should you seek to conceal yourself,
know my name.
Empty and primal, haughty and aloof,
ninefold transformations of the Profound Darkness.
Sitting and rising with the Six Jia,
visiting and registering with the Six Ding.
Grant me the hidden scriptures,
to tread the Dipper and traverse the stars.
Looking up, I behold the Supreme Sovereign,
robed in cinnabar and azure,
holding the numinous radiance in hand,
jade bells girded at the waist.
Above, I beseech flight as an immortal,
to be born together with heaven.
My name inscribed in the Grand Tenuity,
floating and transforming in the Highest Clarity.
Below, I beseech transformation,
to conceal my light and record my form.
May all affairs be as wished,
all past grievances smoothed.
Those who harbor malice toward me—
slain by divine soldiers."

The *Golden Root Scripture of the Supreme Ultimate* states:
"When you ascend the Profound Darkness and tread the Dipper to conceal your form,
should you desire transformation,
you must know my name.
Revolving heaven and moving earth,
the myriad things instantly take shape."

When treading the Profound Darkness or desiring concealment, one must hold this name in the heart.

Having completed the Way of Treading the Dipper, one then steps with both feet onto the Star of Cinnabar Prime. With the left hand placed upon the heart and the right hand pointing to the North Star, hold the breath for three cycles, knock the teeth thrice, and swallow saliva thrice—this is called "Treading the Guideline."

A whispered invocation follows:
"Supreme Nine Terraces,
Cinnabar Prime and the Mysterious Guideline,
externally governing the North Star,
internally rectifying the heavenly principle.
Golden Gates shine without,
Jade Court radiates within.
At its center dwells the Most Honored,
styled the Crimson Child,
governing within Cinnabar Prime,
in the Crimson Chamber.
Embroidered clouds of kingfisher hue,
dragon robes and tiger skirts.
In the right hand, the Imperial Register;
in the left, the Handle of the Dipper.
Feet treading upon radiant clouds,
head crowned with purple coronets.
To the right, hanging bells;
to the left, jade pendants.
Grant me the hidden scriptures,
to tread the Guideline and wander.
Above, I beseech flight as an immortal,
riding the dark dragon.
My name inscribed in the Cinnabar Terrace,
in the Jade Hall of the Supreme Ultimate.
Wherever I turn, wherever I seek,
blessings and fortune come to meet me.
Those who harbor malice toward me—
may they be annihilated.
Attended by divine officials,
jade maidens and jade lads."

Having completed the Way of Treading the Guideline, one then steps with both feet onto the North Star. With the right hand placed upon the heart and the left hand pointing to the Celestial Pivot Star, hold the breath for three cycles, knock the teeth thrice, and swallow saliva thrice—this is called "Treading the Net."

A whispered invocation follows:
"Mysterious and supreme Grand Tenuity,
Purple Canopy of the North Star.
Below dwells the Supreme Perfected,
soaring beyond the Nine Exteriors.
Kingfisher skirts in flight,
golden bells and azure sashes.
At the waist, a jade radiance,
dark clouds swirling and gathering.
Grant me the hidden scriptures,
to ascend and traverse the Seven Qi.
Ascending the Clarity to sport in the mist,
the Perfected gather in assembly.
I beseech flight as an immortal,
my name inscribed in the Cinnabar Chamber.
Wherever I turn, may my wishes be fulfilled,
without calamity or harm.
Those who harbor malice toward me—
may they suffer defeat and injury."

Having completed the Way of Treading the Net, one then steps with both feet onto the Celestial Pivot Star. With the right hand placed upon the heart and the left hand pointing to the Celestial Pivot, hold the breath for three cycles, knock the teeth thrice, and swallow saliva thrice—this is called "Riding the Dragon."

A whispered invocation follows:
"Supreme Seven Poles,
Purple Tenuity beyond the stars.
Precious Mystery and Golden Chamber,
without, the Jade Gate.
Revolving through the Nine Palaces,
harmonizing the Celestial Pivot.
At its center dwells the Honored Divinity,
styled the Purple Sovereign.
Grant me the hidden scriptures,
to carry me and ride the dragon.
Above, soaring through the Nine Heavens;
below, flying through the Primal Earth.
Radiant clouds and cinnabar chariots,
dark flowers and kingfisher skirts.
At the waist, a dragon tally;
on the head, tiger-patterned kerchiefs.
Encompassing the birth of the myriad things,
instructing and guiding the flying immortals.
Freeing me from the name of death,
eternally preserved in heaven and earth.
Riding the dragon and treading the Dipper,
wherever I turn, I receive favor.
Those who harbor malice toward me—
wind blades and fire consume them."

Having completed the Way of Riding the Dragon, one then steps with both feet onto the Auxiliary Star, holds the breath for one cycle, knocks the teeth thrice, and swallows saliva once—this is called "Wandering the Three Destinies," revolving and treading the Celestial Flower.

A whispered invocation follows:
"Star of the Supreme Ultimate’s Auxiliary,
its essence residing in the Purple Barrier.
Nurturing life and fostering destiny,
preciously guarding the spirit-soul.
The Golden Chamber opens again,
to behold the Lord of the Auxiliary.
Grant me the hidden scriptures,
to make me wander and revolve.
My name listed with the Sage Sovereign,
flying immortal of the Nine Heavens.
Kerchief of gold and girdle of the Perfected,
entering and exiting the Grotto-Gate."

Having completed Wandering the Three Destinies, one then returns to tread upon the Star of Assistance, stepping with both feet, holding the breath for one cycle, knocking the teeth thrice, and swallowing saliva once—this is called "Pacing the Three Yangs," entering and exiting the Three Lives.

A whispered invocation follows:
"Mud-Pill Palace of the Great Void,
Celestial Honored One of the Purple Palace.
Mysterious Void and True Pivot,
foremost of the Emperor.
In the Dao, the Jade Sovereign;
in the body, the Mud-Pill.
Riding the swift and sudden arising,
qi piercing the Primal Empyrean.
Essence entering the Hall of Light,
strengthening the embryo and benefiting the soul.
The Vermilion Mountain opens again,
to draw near the Numinous Prime.
To the left, gathering the radiance of the sun;
to the right, plucking the root of the moon.
Flowing fire ten thousand fathoms,
golden net and azure skirts.
At the waist, the Celestial Bone;
on the head, the Floral Crown.
Grant me the hidden scriptures,
to traverse the Celestial Pivot.
I beseech flight as an immortal,
to command the myriad spirits.
Wherever I turn, all converges,
fortune and virtue like mountains."

When performing these practices, one faces north, holding the hidden scriptures, and acts accordingly. One may also follow the text while observing the stars, without reciting from memory.
